commits.content:
## The default Uninav (especially its mobile offcanvas/drilldown menu) caused ## crazy slow publish times, to the point where the sidewide publish was taking ## over 20 hours. This is a hot fix to appease stakeholders. #if ($currentPage.name == 'index') #import ("_cascade/formats/modular/uninav/_uninav.vtl") #else
